Being dumb, painful Jekyll setup

27 Nov 2015 Incredibly annoyed that it took me so long to set things up with jekyll here. I began customization through the index page, making edits to the html and every darn time I restarted the server, the changes would never go through. It was by chance that I decided to mess with the _config.yml file and found that some parameters defined here were being passed to the index. This meant that no matter how many times... [Read More]
